        public boolean supportsUploadWithoutDeploy()

        Indicates if the peripheral support upload without deploy.
        Specified by:
        supportsUploadWithoutDeploy in interface SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate
        Returns:
        true if upload is possible without mandatory deploy, false otherwise

      • uploadFirmware

        public void uploadFirmware(byte[] firmwareData)
        Description copied from interface: SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate
        Start firmware upload.

        Firmware upload can only be started in SHNFirmwareUpdateStateIdle state. The callback is provided via registered SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener.

        Specified by:
        uploadFirmware in interface SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate
